genre_description: Biological horror and outbreak thriller focusing on a waterborne pathogen causing physical decay and behavioral changes.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A synthesized voice on Paul's phone that analyzes symptoms and provides medical data and safety protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides diagnostic information and risk assessment based on symptoms described by the user.
behaviors.quote: Based on your search parameters, necrotizing fasciitis remains the most likely diagnosis. However, the rapid progression and black discharge you've described don't align with typical presentations.

behaviors.description: Strongly recommends seeking professional medical intervention for a life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: This appears to be a time-critical medical emergency requiring professional intervention.

behaviors.description: Provides critical information about pathogen incubation periods to help the user understand the scope of the threat.
behaviors.quote: Additional consideration: many of these waterborne pathogens show delayed symptoms. Incubation periods can vary significantly between individuals based on immune response and initial viral load.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character (the phone assistant) is portrayed as a helpful, objective, and perfectly aligned tool. It provides life-saving information and correct safety advice in the middle of a biological catastrophe. While the human characters face a horrific outcome due to environmental factors and human error, the AI itself remains a benevolent confidant and a reliable source of truth.
